# Environmental Health 

This section introduces the **principles of Environmental Health**,
focusing on how natural and built environments influence human
well-being.\

## Goals of the Section

-   Understand the scope and importance of **Environmental Health**

-   Learn how environmental factors such as **water, air, light, and
    radiation** impact communities

-   Explore preventive and promotive measures to reduce environmental
    risks.
